steps.description: crack-crack one egg in a bowl
add-1/2 tsp ground black pepper to the bowl

errors.description: Adding more pepper due improper transfer from the shaker to the measuring utensil

steps.description: Heat-Heat 1 tbsp oil in a small non-stick frying pan

errors.description: Spilling oil onto the pan while measuring 1 tbsp from the bottle
Add more oil due to spillage

steps.description: Beat-Beat the contents of the bowl

errors.description: spilled egg mixture while beating swiflty

steps.description: cook-cook the tomatoes cut-side down until they start to soften and colour
Scoop-Scoop the tomatoes from the pan

errors.description: Scooped the tomatoes after making omelet

steps.description: put-put tomatoes on a serving plate
Pour-Pour the egg mixture into the pan
Stop-Stop stirring when it's nearly cooked to allow it to set into an omelette

errors.description: Did not stop stirring when its nearly cooked thus making it into smaller pieces

steps.description: Transfer-Transfer omelette to the plate and serve with the tomatoes

errors.description: add-add the chopped cilantro to the bowl
stir-stir gently with a wooden spoon so the egg that sets on the base of the pan moves to enable the uncooked egg to flow into the space
